title: WEB 版請保留可以睇到 出POST/回POST 時間呢個選擇

replies.msg:
WEB 版請保留可以睇到 出POST/回POST 時間呢個選擇,

巳方便某d事件 以連登出POST/回POST為準以作大家參考.


Thanks.




而家淨係可以睇到幾多分鐘前, 幾多日前
Desktop 版有tooltip

Desktop 版有tooltip

？？

Desktop 版有tooltip

？？

The tooltip or infotip or a hint is a common graphical user interface element. It is used in conjunction with a cursor, usually a pointer. The user hovers the pointer over an item, without clicking it, and a tooltip may appear—a small "hover box" with information about the item being hovered over.


啱啱試完無反應, 反野睇.

Desktop 版有tooltip

？？

The tooltip or infotip or a hint is a common graphical user interface element. It is used in conjunction with a cursor, usually a pointer. The user hovers the pointer over an item, without clicking it, and a tooltip may appear—a small "hover box" with information about the item being hovered over.


啱啱試完無反應, 反野睇.

你用咩browser?

web版個追故模式可唔可以hide晒其他user
而家都係要碌一大輪先睇到樓主reply
仲有可唔可以俾人揀向下碌唔自動load下一頁

Desktop 版有tooltip

？？

The tooltip or infotip or a hint is a common graphical user interface element. It is used in conjunction with a cursor, usually a pointer. The user hovers the pointer over an item, without clicking it, and a tooltip may appear—a small "hover box" with information about the item being hovered over.


啱啱試完無反應, 反野睇.

啱啱指個 pointer 埋去睇得翻, 應該做咗野

指去隻眼就出 "追故模式",

指去所有特定 icon 都有指示顯示出嚟
